messages.message: Only site admins and certain permission users can see this button.
Technically we have Converse/Build on the hub page.

Got it, makes sense if only for site admins :+1::skin-tone-4: Still room to consider a "Create" button from Hub

Converse/Build options don't show if you're in a tab (eg: in recently used). I also feel like we should try to distance them from being apps and more like studios - @alagu I know this is something you've been thinking about too
I’m going on vacation soon but when I’m back Siya and I will update these things.
Yes I agree @avi that build/converse shouldn't show up in this tab anymore - they're studios and not resulting apps.
@Siya is working on a broader refresh of the app page though so cc'ing for visibility here
